annotation.summary: Marks a creature with solar energy, making it easier to target and negating invisibility or concealment effects. Also extends the range of your solar flare when targeting the branded creature.

annotation.prerequisites: ability to use solar flare or related solar powers

annotation.summary: The brand effect remains active for 10 minutes but ends early if the branded creature dies or if the user applies the Star Brand to another creature.

annotation.summary: When graviton-attuned, the character gains a fly Speed equal to their normal Speed, allowing them to move through the air freely.

annotation.summary: A Solarian ability that allows instantaneous movement by attuning to cosmic energy, enabling teleportation over a limited distance.

annotation.summary: You make a Strike with your solar weapon; if it hits, you teleport up to your Speed to a space within reach of another creature and immediately make a second solar weapon Strike against that new target. If the first Strike misses, the effect ends.

annotation.summary: Depending on attunement, the ability either doubles movement range (Graviton) or causes a dazzled condition on a critical hit (Photon).
annotation.action_economy: Varies; used as part of an action that includes movement or a Strike.
annotation.prerequisites: Character must be attuned to either Graviton or Photon mode.

annotation.summary: A feature or state related to a Solarian character who has achieved attunement, allowing them to manifest special powers or abilities tied to their stellar energy.
annotation.action_economy: Varies depending on the specific manifestation; often a standard or move action.
annotation.prerequisites: Character must be a Solarian and have reached a sufficient level of attunement.

annotation.summary: When you raise your solar shield, it grants its circumstance bonus to Will saves. Additionally, while raised, you can use Shield Block when taking damage from a failed Will save, though that damage ignores the shield’s object immunities.
annotation.action_economy: Requires the Raise a Shield action to be active; Shield Block reaction can be used when taking damage from a failed Will save.
annotation.prerequisites: Must have a solar shield and the ability to use Shield Block.

annotation.summary: This ability can only be used if your most recent action was a successful attack made with a solar weapon.

annotation.summary: When you become photon-attuned, you create an afterimage in the square you started from that lasts until the end of your next turn or until another creature enters that space. The afterimage counts as an ally for flanking purposes.
annotation.action_economy: Passive effect triggered upon photon attunement
annotation.prerequisites: Must be photon-attuned

annotation.summary: The ability allows the user to channel solar energy through their shield, using its gravitational power to enhance solar flare attacks.

annotation.summary: Creates two linked wormholes within 100 feet that allow creatures to instantly travel between them. The wormholes must be at least 15 feet apart, placed in visible, unoccupied spaces within line of effect, and last 1 round unless sustained for up to 1 minute. If no valid exit space exists, the wormholes collapse and the creature stays in place. The effect interacts with the user's attunement when the Wormhole action is taken.
annotation.action_economy: Takes the Wormhole action; can be Sustained each round to maintain up to 1 minute.
annotation.prerequisites: Requires the ability to take the Wormhole action and an attunement that determines its effects.

annotation.summary: Creatures starting their turn next to a wormhole must make a Fortitude save or be pulled into it.
annotation.prerequisites: must be graviton-attuned

annotation.summary: A creature that enters the wormhole gains the concealed condition until the start of its next turn.
annotation.action_economy: Triggered upon entering the wormhole; no additional action required.
annotation.prerequisites: Must enter the wormhole while photon-attuned.
